DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical investigation assess clinical subjective performance three novel multipurpose disinfect solution ( MPDS ) daily wear two silicone hydrogel contact lenses ( Lotrafilcon B Comfilcon A ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Subjective Performance Three Different MPDS With Silicon Hydrogel Lenses
DOC.criteria: age 18 experienced contact lens user good health ( selfreported ) eye disease eye operation pregnancy medication affect sight
